body: @Balaji I was able to figure our API mapping in order to link custom subdomain with the API. But I get 'Missing Authentication token' when I use https://api.example.com, in this case lambdanotifications..com. I also tried lambdanotifications..com/notifications and lambdanotifications.***.com/notifications/test on browser but same thing.
title: AWS Lambda and Google Drive Push Notification integration possible?
